Another successful week of restriction. We'll see how this weekend goes with the higher intake.

* **Breakfast**: Multi-Vitamin, 200mg Caffeine * **Lunch**: 200mg Caffeine, 200g Total 2%, 32g Trader Joe's Omega Trek Mix, 20g Quest Multi Purpose Mix, 1 packet Truvia (391) * **Dinner**: 200mg Caffeine, 200g Total 2%, 32g Trader Joe's Omega Trek Mix, 20g Quest Multi Purpose Mix, 6g Truvia Baking Blend (401)
**TOTAL**: 792
It's getting harder to restrict on the weekends with my boyfriend, and honestly I don't even *want* to do it anymore. I don't like lying to him about why I'm not eating, and I've noticed that when I eat less he does too (which he absolutely shouldn't, considering he's 6'1" and already on the lower end of his healthy weight range).
Going forward I plan to eat 800 calories M-F (with a split of 40% Protein, 35% Fat and 25% Carbs) and 1800 on Saturday and Sunday. I'm scared to go that high but I want my love to be happy and healthy, so if that means eating more calories with him then I can do that. I will do that.

* **Breakfast**: Stack, 200g Fage Total 2%, 6g Truvia Baking Blend, 28g Trader Joe's Omega Trek Mix, 18g Quest Multi-Purpose Protein Mix (399) * **Lunch**: Stack, Fage Total 2% with Blood Orange (140) * **Dinner**: 200g Fage Total 2%, 6g Truvia Baking Blend, 28g Trader Joe's Happy Trekking Mix, 18g Quest Multi-Purpose Protein Mix (449)
**TOTAL**: 988 calories; 79g Carbs, 40g Fat, 92g Protein
So far cutting back on the stack hasn't made a huge impact and I'm hoping it stays that way.

* **Breakfast**: Stack, 200g Fage Total 2% Greek Yogurt, 4g Truvia Baking Blend, 28g Trader Joe's Omega Trek Mix, 20g Fiber One Bran Cereal, 18g Quest Multi Purpose Protein Mix (434) * **Lunch**: Stack, 8g Mini Kit Kat Bar, 8g Reese's Miniature Cup (91) * **Dinner**: 200g Fage Total 2%, 4g Truvia Baking Blend, 28g Trader Joe's Go Raw Trek Mix, 28g Quest Multi Purpose Protein Mix (470)
**TOTAL**: 995
I just realized I haven't binged in 17 days. I had chocolate for lunch today because I wanted it, and didn't feel the need to binge eat it. Only negative is I slept like shit last night so I'm going to try and cut back to stacking twice a day and taking it a little earlier. Hopefully my sleep quality will go back up and my appetite won't come back with too much a vengeance.
